entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
